alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central St. Lucie County through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Port Saint Lucie, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Fort Pierce, White City, Port Saint Lucie River Park, and Tradition. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie
